General.Name: Qingdao Gaoce Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Gaoce Technology Co., Ltd research, develops, manufactures, and sells cutting equipment for hard and brittle materials, and cutting tools in China. The company offers photovoltaic cutting equipment, such as diamond wire slicing machine, diamond wire single crystal cutting machine, diamond wire, wire polycrystalline cutting machine, diamond wire single crystal square cutting machine, etc; semiconductor cutting equipment; silicon carbide cutting machines, which include silicon slicer, thinning, chamfering machines, and diamond wire for silicon carbide cutting; magnetic cutting; sapphire cutting; and silicon wafer equipment. It offers its products to photovoltaic industry. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.
